abstract: Amid signs that credit was beginning to flow more easily, investors sent the Dow up 413 points. The S.&P. gained 4.8 percent.
snippet: Amid signs that credit was beginning to flow more easily, investors sent the Dow up 413 points. The S.&P. gained 4.8 percent.
lead_paragraph: After weeks of extraordinary efforts by the world’s governments and central banks, the frozen flow of credit began to thaw on Monday.

headline.main: Signs of Easing Credit and Stimulus Talk Lift Wall Street
headline.print_headline: Thawing BEGINS In Credit FLOW; DOW RISES by 413
